code: import React from"react";import{ListGroup}from"reactstrap";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import CartItem from"./CartItem";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{cartUiActions}from"../../../store/shopping-cart/cartUiSlice";import"../../../styles/shopping-cart.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Carts=()=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();const cartProducts=useSelector(state=>state.cart.cartItems);const totalAmount=useSelector(state=>state.cart.totalAmount);const toggleCart=()=>{dispatch(cartUiActions.toggle());};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cart__container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ListGroup,{className:"cart",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cart__close",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{onClick:toggleCart,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{class:"ri-close-fill"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cart__item-list",children:cartProducts.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h6",{className:"text-center mt-5",children:"No item added to the cart"}):cartProducts.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CartItem,{item:item},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart__bottom d-flex align-items-center justify-content-between",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h6",{children:["Subtotal : ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["$",totalAmount]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/checkout",onClick:toggleCart,children:"Checkout"})})]})]})});};export default Carts;
